ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Bard drum graphic
ygData.msgSnippet: Let s put this into perspective... Bard drum graphic - Too large for a patch Barb shield graphic - ditto Ranger s Short Sword of Morin - In there bay-beeee!
ygData.messageBody:
Let's put this into perspective...
Bard drum graphic - "Too large for a patch"
Barb shield graphic - ditto
Ranger's Short Sword of Morin - In there bay-beeee! (and yes, that was well
AFTER Beta)

-=B=-
NOR Bard, Esq.
27ty
The Rathe
-----Original Message-----
From: kevikazzam@... <kevikazzam@...>
To: eqbards@onelist.com <eqbards@onelist.com>
Date: Thursday, March 16, 2000 2:19 AM
Subject: [eqbards] Bard drum graphic


>From: kevikazzam@...
>
> I made a post on the Kunark General boards asking if the bard drum
>graphic, which i now believe never existed ( they had stated it was some
bug
>or somesuch ) would be fixed.Brad stated that it will most likely not be
>fixed in the expansion. They already stated that it was too large a file to
>patch, being a graphics file, so i thought for sure they would put it in
the
>expansion, but now, no. bah.... Seems so silly to me, ooh look the trees
>sway, the textures are amazing, the creatures and new weapons are
>fantanstic.....but wait , i'm still strumming a stick. kinda detracts from
>the whole magic of it for me . here is the link -
>
><A
>HREF="http://boards.station.sony.com/ubb/eq-expansion/Forum1/HTML/002060.ht
ml"
>>Bard drum Graphic-</A>
